resources.string: Click on the add button to insert a new record. You can select up to 10 contacts for each record. Messages will be forwarded automatically after creating a record.
1. This keyword will be used to filter incoming SMS.
2. Keyword can be of multiple words also. Keyword is case insensitive.
3. Keep the keyword blank to forward all messages.
No internet access is used by this application. The messages will be forwarded only to those contacts you set the keyword with.
